presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Unassigned SRs

presentationColumns.name: # of Waiting SRs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs that are in Queue and waiting to be assigned (status = Waiting)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Waiting SRs

tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Closed Critical SRs

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Reopened SRs

tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of High Severity SRs

localization.localizationKey: # of Open High Severity Critical SRs

presentationColumns.name: # of SRs Resolved in under 24 hrs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs that were resolved in under 24 hours after they were opened
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of SRs Resolved in under 24 hrs

localization.localizationKey: # of SRs Resolved in under 24 hrs

presentationColumns.name: # of SRs Resolved in 24-48 hrs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs that were resolved in between 24-48 hours after they were opened
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of SRs Resolved in 24-48 hrs

presentationColumns.name: # of Initial Resource Assigned SRs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of assigned SRs
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.# of Initial Resource Assigned SRs

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Reopened SRs
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs Reopened/( Resolved + Closed Status)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.Average # of Reopened SRs

presentationColumns.name: % Reopened SRs
presentationColumns.description: The % of now Closed SRs that were Reopened in SR lifecycle. This metric is computed as follows: (# of Reopened SRs that are in Closed state/# of Closed SRs)*100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.% Reopened SRs

presentationColumns.name: SR Resolution Rate
presentationColumns.description: The SRs Resolution rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 *( # of Resolved + Closed SRs)/# of SRs
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.SR Resolution Rate

presentationColumns.name: SR Resolution Rate (Monthly)
presentationColumns.description: The monthly SR resolution Rate
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.SR Resolution Rate (Monthly)

presentationColumns.name: Month Ago SR Resolution Rate (Monthly)
presentationColumns.description: The SR Resolution rate of the previous month
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.Month Ago SR Resolution Rate (Monthly)

presentationColumns.name: SR Resolution Velocity Rate (Monthly)
presentationColumns.description: The change in Velocity of SRs resolution. This metric is computed as follows: ((SR resolution rate Current month - SR resolution rate Previous month)/SR resolution rate Previous month) *100
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Service Request.SR Resolution Velocity Rate (Monthly)
